name: Honey Inc.
description:
This game was created in 72 hours specifically for #LudumDare52

Today is the deadline for the delivery of the harvest and each hive-factory must chip in honey. 

But subordinates do not want to work: someone is simply distracted by magazines or listening to music, and someone smokes in the corner. In any case, they all need to be quickly motivated and sent to work! 

Deadlines are on!

Monusy - GameDesigner/Animator

ParPanSs - Programmer

Nomersol - Artist
